column6: Wade Wilson and Nathan Summers are back - and this time, they're stuck with each other! Can two grown men with deadly genetic weaponry work together without driving each other crazy?! Action, adventure, black-ops, black humor and lots and lots of gunfire mark the return of your two favorite mutant anti-heroes to their own ongoing series!
column8: | penciller:Mark Brooks | penciller (cover):Rob Liefeld | writer:Fabian Nicieza
